    • Method Detail

      • decodeSampledBitmapFromUri

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeSampledBitmapFromUri(android.content.Context c,
                                                 android.net.Uri uri,
                                                 int reqWidth,
                                                 int reqHeight)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Decodes an appropriately sized bitmap from the given Uri to be displayed by an ImageView.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the picture to be displayed.
        reqWidth - The requested width of the output image.
        reqHeight - The requested height of the output image.
        Returns:
        An appropriately sized bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the provided URI could not be opened.

      • makeSquare

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap makeSquare(android.graphics.Bitmap source)
        A method for adding a border to a bitmap so that the resulting image is square.
        Parameters:
        source - bitmap to be made square.
        Returns:
        the original bitmap with borders added to either the top or bottom such that it is now square.

      • calculateInSampleSize

        public static int calculateInSampleSize(android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options,
                        int reqWidth,
                        int reqHeight)
        A method that calculates how much a bitmap should be scaled down by.
        Parameters:
        options - BitmapFactory.Options with "inJustDecodeBounds" set to true that has already been used to decoded a bitmap.
        reqWidth - The requested width of the output image.
        reqHeight - The requested height of the output image.
        Returns:
        the nearest power of two that can be used to scale a bitmap to the requested height and width.

      • generate

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap generate(android.content.Context c,
                               android.net.Uri imageUri)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a Square Bitmap from the given Uri.
        Parameters:
        c - The context in which to open the InputStream needed to decode the Bitmap.
        imageUri - The Uri of the image to be turned into a sqr.
        Returns:
        an optimally scaled Bitmap for displaying in an ImageView.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
